name: Kawasaki Jet Ski
overview: Ported from a European PlayStation 2 title, Kawasaki Jetski brings its own brand of high-speed sea-skimming to North American Wiis. A variety of courses located throughout the world send gamers speeding along the Thames River, careening down the Canadian Rockies, and veering through the Venetian canals. A stunt mode lets creative players use their Wii Remote to perform numerous airborne tricks, solo gamers can try out Championship Mode and Time Trial, or they can join a friend for multiplayer racing.
